# url

**Instance Property**

The URL of a directory where you read and write game-save data.

## Declaration

```swift
var url: URL { get }
```

## Discussion

You define the format and structure of files you write in this directory.

## Accessing saved game state

- **isLocal**: `true` if the directory version is local; otherwise `false`.

items.description: `true` if the directory version is local; otherwise `false`.
